name: market for water discharge from petroleum/natural gas extraction, onshore | water discharge from petroleum/natural gas extraction, onshore | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8065/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'water discharge from petroleum/natural gas extraction, onshore', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.

The activity starts with the input from the treatment processes.

A market for a material for treatment (wastes or recyclables) ends with the provision of treatment, i.e. a mix of treatment providers, to activities that generate the reference product as a waste/by-product.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/06:Extraction of crude petroleum and natural gas/061:Extraction of crude petroleum/0610:Extraction of crude petroleum
tags: Sector: Waste Treatment & Recycling; Resource Extraction
